Classification: Documentary

Network: BBC TWO ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Sundays at 08:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: September 09, 2012
Episode Order: 2

China On Four Wheels follows Anita Rani and Justin Rowlatt as they leave in a pair of epic car journeys through China. They have to navigate congested cities and winding mountain roads as they attempt to find out whether the countryâ€™s economic growth, exemplified by its booming car industry, can be sustained.
